html: The tower built in the midst of the vineyard could have been the temple built by Solomon. This inference is drawn from the latter-day parable concerning another tower (temple) which was to be built upon a "very choice piece of land" (Jackson County, Missouri) but has not yet been built (see D&C 101:43-62). (For this interpretation of the tower-temple, see Hyrum M. Smith and Janne M. Sjodahl, Doctrine and Covenants Commentary, rev. ed. [Salt Lake City: Deseret Book Company, 1967], p. 647.)
